title: pbe account disabled
body: pls help me get my pbe account back for some reason it has been disabled

replies.body: It sounds like you might be trying to access a legacy account, though I can't say for sure.  What happens if you[ create a new PBE account](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe)?  If you run into any issues, reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can look into this with you directly.
